Uses of Interface
com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger

  • Packages that use Logger 
    Package Description
    com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
    This package contains the classes that implement a simple monitor for controlling server processes.
    com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo
    This package contains the classes that implement a abstract base classes for Mojos that utilise the Monitor framework.

      Configure the a server property.

      Execute a command that was sent to the monitor.

      Read the key and command combination from the client socket connection.

      Get the singleton instance of the locator using the default class loader.
      static ServerFactoryLocator ServerFactoryLocator.getInstance​(Logger logger, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Get the singleton instance of the locator using the specified class loader.

      Invoked by the monitor to check if the server has launched.

      Invoked by the monitor to check if the server has halted.
      boolean Server.isStopped​(Logger logger)

      Run the monitor listening for commands and sending them to the server.
      Thread Monitor.runMonitorDaemon​(Server server, Logger logger, MonitorObserver observer)
      Spawn a thread used to run the monitor as daemon processes.
      private void Monitor.runMonitorInternal​(Server server, Logger logger, ServerSocket serverSocket)
      Run the monitor listening for commands at serverSocket and sending them to the server.

      Static method used to send a command to a server via a monitor.

      Send a command to the monitor.

    • Uses of Logger in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo

      Classes in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo that implement Logger 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractRunMojo
      Abstract base class for mojos that implement the run goal for plug-ins that use the Monitor framework.
      class  AbstractServerMojo
      Abstract base class for mojos that implement the stop and run goals for plug-ins that use the Monitor framework.
      class  AbstractStopMojo
      Implements the stop goal for plug-ins that use the Monitor framework.
